data.title: IU Indianapolis Chancellor's Medallion
data.text:
John Hardin, Jr.

Purdue University trustee emeritus received an IUPUI 50th Anniversary Chancellor’s Medallion on December 11, 2019.

Dr. Philip Eskew, Jr.

IU trustee emeritus received an IUPUI 50th Anniversary Chancellor’s Medallion on December 11, 2019.

Gerald L. Bepko

IUPUI chancellor emeritus received an IUPUI 50th Anniversary Chancellor’s Medallion during the Bepko Scholar Recognition Dinner on September 11, 2019.

Robert Martin

Retired IUPUI vice chancellor for administration and finance received an IUPUI 50th Anniversary Chancellor’s Medallion on June 18, 2019, at an Indiana Members Credit Union Board Meeting.

Erwin Boschmann

Professor emeritus of chemistry and former associate dean of faculties received an IUPUI 50th Anniversary Chancellor’s Medallion on June 5, 2019, at the School of Science’s “Science on Tap” event.

Simon Rhodes

Dean of the School of Science received an IUPUI 50th Anniversary Chancellor’s Medallion on May 17, 2019, during his going-away reception.

Sarah Evans Barker

Senior judge of the United States District Court for the Southern District of Indiana received an IUPUI 50th Anniversary Chancellor’s Medallion on May 11, 2019, during IUPUI Commencement.

Matthew Steward

Founder and president of the Steward Speakers Power Series received an IUPUI 50th Anniversary Chancellor’s Medallion on May 9, 2019, during the Steward Speakers Lecture Series with Phylicia Rashad.

Curt Simic

Indiana University Foundation president emeritus received an IUPUI 50th Anniversary Chancellor’s Medallion during the Cox Scholars graduation ceremony on May 6, 2019.

Jesse and Beulah Cox

Benefactors of the Cox Scholars Program, the largest scholarship program at IUPUI and Indiana University, were posthumously presented with an IUPUI 50th Anniversary Chancellor’s Medallion during the Cox Scholars graduation ceremony on May 6, 2019.

Ali Jafari

Professor of computer and information technology and director of the CyberLab in the School of Engineering and Technology received an IUPUI 50th Anniversary Chancellor’s Medallion during the School of Engineering and Technology Bepko Honors Convocation on April 18, 2019.

Uday Sukhatme

Former executive vice chancellor and dean of the faculties at IUPUI received an IUPUI 50th Anniversary Chancellor’s Medallion during the Chancellor’s Academic Honors Convocation on April 18, 2019.

Christine Fitzpatrick

Chief of staff in the Office of the Chancellor received an IUPUI 50th Anniversary Chancellor’s Medallion during the Welcoming Campus Conference on April 16, 2019.

Undergraduate Student Government (USG)

The group received an IUPUI 50th Anniversary Chancellor’s Medallion on April 12, 2019.

Scott Evenbeck

Founding dean of University College received an IUPUI 50th Anniversary Chancellor’s Medallion during the Division of Undergraduate Education Spring Awards Convocation on April 11, 2019.

Graduate and Professional Student Government (GPSG)

The group received an IUPUI 50th Anniversary Chancellor’s Medallion during the Elite 50 dinner on April 10, 2019.

Robert G. Bringle

Former executive director of the IUPUI Center for Service and Learning and Chancellor’s Professor emeritus received an IUPUI 50th Anniversary Chancellor’s Medallion during the Bringle and Hatcher Civic Engagement Showcase on April 9, 2019.

Charles R. Bantz

IUPUI chancellor emeritus received an IUPUI 50th Anniversary Chancellor’s Medallion during the Bringle and Hatcher Civic Engagement Showcase on April 9, 2019.

Dr. Kathleen Warfel Hull

Professor emerita of pathology received an IUPUI 50th Anniversary Chancellor’s Medallion during the 22nd Annual IUPUI Women’s Leadership Reception on March 26, 2019.

Khaula Murtadha

Associate vice chancellor for community engagement received an IUPUI 50th Anniversary Chancellor’s Medallion at the Black Faculty and Staff Council Brunch on February 21, 2019.

Giles Hoyt

Professor emeritus of German and philanthropic studies received an IUPUI 50th Anniversary Chancellor’s Medallion at the Office of International Affairs 30th anniversary celebration on February 20, 2019.

Dolores Hoyt

Librarian emerita and former associate dean for the University Library received an IUPUI 50th Anniversary Chancellor’s Medallion at the Office of International Affairs 30th anniversary celebration on February 20, 2019.

Patricia Biddinger

Inaugural director of the Office of International Studies received an IUPUI 50th Anniversary Chancellor’s Medallion at the Office of International Affairs 30th anniversary celebration on February 20, 2019.

Joseph and Hertha Taylor

Founding dean of the IU School of Liberal Arts Joseph Taylor posthumously received an IUPUI 50th Anniversary Chancellor’s Medallion at the 30th Annual Taylor Symposium on February 20, 2019, as did his wife, Hertha. The Taylors’ children, Judy and Hussain, accepted the award on their behalf.

Rebecca Porter

Retired interim dean of the School of Health and Rehabilitation Sciences and former associate vice chancellor for the Division of Enrollment Management received an IUPUI 50th Anniversary Chancellor’s Medallion at the Toast to IUPUI on January 24, 2019.

Sharon Holland

Director of alumni and special programs at the IUPUI Office of Alumni Relations received an IUPUI 50th Anniversary Chancellor’s Medallion at the Toast to IUPUI on January 24, 2019.

Mark Grove

Former IUPUI registrar received an IUPUI 50th Anniversary Chancellor’s Medallion at the Toast to IUPUI on January 24, 2019.

Stefan Davis

Retired executive director of the IUPUI Office of Alumni Relations and associate vice president of the IU Alumni Association received an IUPUI 50th Anniversary Chancellor’s Medallion at the Toast to IUPUI on January 24, 2019.

Hon. Bart Peterson

Former mayor of Indianapolis received an IUPUI 50th Anniversary Chancellor’s Medallion at the Report to the Community on January 24, 2019.

Senator Richard Lugar

Former US senator and mayor of Indianapolis received an IUPUI 50th Anniversary Chancellor’s Medallion at the Report to the Community on January 24, 2019.

Mayor Joe Hogsett

Current mayor of Indianapolis received an IUPUI 50th Anniversary Chancellor’s Medallion at the Report to the Community on January 24, 2019.

Hon. Stephen Goldsmith

Former mayor of Indianapolis received an IUPUI 50th Anniversary Chancellor’s Medallion at the Report to the Community on January 24, 2019.

Hon. Greg Ballard

Former mayor of Indianapolis received an IUPUI 50th Anniversary Chancellor’s Medallion at the Report to the Community on January 24, 2019.

N. Douglas Lees

Retired associate dean for planning and finance of the School of Science at IUPUI received an IUPUI 50th Anniversary Chancellor’s Medallion on January 18, 2019.
